name: KPOP PIANO: Magic Music Tiles!
description:
- Kpop Piano will challenge your reflexes and reaction time while you play Edm & Kpop music (army, blink, exo-l, once...) songs!

HOW TO PLAY
----------------------------------
The game is pretty simple and easy to play:
- tap the piano tiles to complete the song.
- Don’t tap the white tiles.
- the longer you resist, the greater your prizes are!

Kpop Piano! will create an extremely interesting experience for anyone who loves Edm & Kpop music (army, blink, exo-l, once...).

All free! Play Kpop Piano! today!
